alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 07 at 10:26PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following area, Chilkat River. * WHEN...Through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Backyards along the Chilkat River in the village of Klukwan may start to flood and impact some smoke houses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Unusually warm daytime temperatures into the 70s and 80s through the weekend may accelerate snow and glacier ice melt in the Chilkat River basin. River levels are expected to rise to the point that water may start to cause issues for areas around Klukwan by Saturday morning. Highest water levels are expected Saturday morning and Sunday morning. There is uncertainty on how high the river will get with the possibilities ranging from the bankfull conditions to minor flooding in some areas. - If you live near or along Chilkat River stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
